text: Union Pacific 7000 Class 4-8-2 was a class of 60 American 4-8-2 Type Steam Locomotives built for the Union Pacific Railroad between 1922-1924 designed to pull passenger trains and freight trains between 1922 and 1956 . They were later replaced by the Union Pacific FEF Series 4-8-4 in the 1930’s and 40’s during World War 2 .They were later scrapped in 1956 . In the Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted the streamlined steam Locomotive pulling the circus train is based on the UP 7000 Class 4-8-2 type locomotive.
title: Union Pacific 7000 Class 4-8-2
